name: Maze Manors
description:
A hidden treasure, winding corridors and stairways in the most unexpected places: Maze Manors is a simple yet intriguing game, where reasoning and intuition are both necessary to win.
The mutable map of each floor is gradually revealed, so that every move is crucial to achieve the best possible score, while the simple and elegant graphic highlights the structure of the building.
Why "mutable"? Two reasons: first, Maze Manors incorporates a topology generation algorithm, thanks to which even with the same map, each game is always different and surprising. Second, after reaching the goal, you have to exit back... but it might not be as easy as you think.
Maze Manors provides three different game modes: in "Find" mode, your target is simply to find a precious gem; in "Unlock", first you have to look for the key, in order to find and open a chest; in "Rebuild", your mission is to find all the four pieces of a magic amulet, scattered among the various floors.
The three game modes and the included maps allow you to experiment with growing difficulties, that will test your quality of seekers!
Bluetooth-enabled multi-playing is available, with an optional turn-based mode.
